page.title: 18The Blue Lion
page.content: The Blue Lion was not always on its present site. Before 1950 it had been on the diagonally opposite corner of Fen Ditton cross roads. It is a tied house owned by Green King Brewery. Alf the landord starts the day at8.00 a.m.. First he stocks up, then cleans the rooms and prepares the kitchen. The pub is open from 10.00 a.m. to 2.30 p.m., after which Alf has a meal and a rest before re-opening from 6.00 p.m. to 11.00 p.m.. He gets to bed at about midnight. The pub has two pool teams and two darts teams, both of which have won many cups and trophies.The crib team are struggling at the moment.Two car clubs meet at the pub, a Volkswagen owners' club and an M.G. owners' club. They have seven ducks, seven geese,two goats and a Jack Russell terrier.
